author: bago
msg: Moved common YAML test code to AbstractYamlTest.

author: mikem
msg: Attaching a patch that does the following:
1. Updates the 2200M message text to be more generic,
as suggested in the description of this issue.
2. Replaces "see next exception" with the in-lined
error message while continuing to do exception
3. Also replaces "see next exception" with in-line
error messages for a couple of other SQL/XML

author: angela
msg: - add separate loc-factory to simple project => reducing dependency
- add separate workspace resource representing the jcr workspace
- move Workspace.restore call to workspace resource.
- consequently RootItemCollection not used any more
- root, workspace resource must not support 'observation' -> moving
